name: Discounts
pages: The "Discounts" rule allows you to give a defined list of players a percentage discount on trade(s). Think of it as a more direct version of the $(l:trade_rules/discount_codes)Discount Codes$() rule, but more secure and far less flexible.

pages.text: This rule has only two inputs of note. The text box in the top-left allows you to define the discount percentage (e.g. input of 10 is a 10% discount).$(br2)Below this is the list of players who qualify for the discount.

pages: Simply type a players username into the text box, and click on the + button once the game finds their profile to add them to the list.$(br)You can also view and remove players from the list below by clicking on the X button next to a players name.
